menu-items.name: Escargots Tradition
menu-items.description: Authentic French country recipe of escargots with parsley, garlic & butter

menu-items.name: Escargots “au gratin”
menu-items.description: Escargots with mushroom, artichoke bottom, spinach, Béchamel sauce. Topped with melted cheese

menu-items.name: Oeuf Cocotte d'Escargots
menu-items.description: Egg poached in Béchamel sauce topped with escargots and mushrooms, seasoned with parsley, garlic & butter

menu-items.name: Mille Feuilles d'Escargots
menu-items.description: Signature dish with homemade puff pastry , escargots & mushrooms with garlic and butter sauce

menu-items.name: Quiche aux Escargots
menu-items.description: Warm “cake” (quiche style) of escargots seasoned with parsley, garlic & butter baked with spinach and shredded mozzarella cheese in a thin puff pastry crust

menu-items.name: Salade aux Escargots
menu-items.description: Chopped Romaine lettuce mixed with escargots (seasoned with parsley, garlic & butter) and sautéed mushrooms. Topped with homemade seasoned croutons.

menu-items.name: Garlic de Speciale
menu-items.description: Escargot with minced garlic and dill, filled with freshly harvested species

menu-items.name: Escargot Togo
menu-items.description: Our special and most luxurious dish, topped with gold flakes. No more description is needed

menu-items.name: Hamburger
menu-items.description: 150g Hamburgare med sallad, dressing och ost

menu-items.name: Pancakes”
menu-items.description: Pankakor med sylt och grädde

menu-items.name: Fish & chips
menu-items.description: Friterad fisk med tjocka bitar av friterad potatis, serveras med dill och citron

menu-items.name: Kid's snail special
menu-items.description: en snigel som passar för det lilla barnet.

menu-items.name: Mandato Primitivo Appassimento Puglia
menu-items.description: Livfulla smaker av solmogen mörk frukt som svarta plommon, körsbär och björnbär. Mjölkchoklad från ekfat och vidare till en fin örtighet som ramar in smaken elegant.

menu-items.name: Nino Ardevi Prosecco
menu-items.description: Friska smaker av citrus, gröna äpplen och aprikos. Intensiva och eleganta dofter av blommor, grapefrukt, päron, gröna äpplen, aprikos och lime

menu-items.name: Le Prince de Courthézon Côtes du Rhône
menu-items.description: Aromer av mogna hallon, kryddiga plommon och nymalen svartpeppar. Silkeslena smaker med lager av svart frukt, djup och intensitet.

menu-items.name: Coca-Cola
menu-items.description: 500ml Coca-Cola.

menu-items.name: Fanta
menu-items.description: 500ml Fanta.

menu-items.name: Crêpe au chocolat
menu-items.description: Thin and light crêpe filled with homemade chocolate sauce. Served with a side of whipped cream

menu-items.name: Crêpe Suzette
menu-items.description: Flavored with fresh orange sauce & flamed with Grand-Marnier liquor

menu-items.name: Chocolate mousse
menu-items.description: Prepared with milk chocolate and egg whites, Ice cream style

menu-items.name: Crêpe Banana Split
menu-items.description: With sliced banana, 1 scoop of ice-cream, homemade chocolate sauce, whipped cream & roasted sliced almonds

menu-items.name: Crème brûlée
menu-items.description: Chilled crème brulée topped with a caramelized crust
